name: QZ - Quest 1
description:
You play as jack the daughter killer.

uncover his motives and explore his nightmares

and lead him to death.

Game is Full of Note Books you can find which will help you uncover the story 

5 Types of Enemies, Various Pickups

DualShock4 is Supported in some stages of the game

30 Minutes of Game-Play with rich story..

Find Books and Interact with them using the key "F" or "Square"

Interact with elevators using the same key.

Note: This game contains flashy screens

W.I.P

Credits already exist in game but not shown due to W.I.P
